_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The principle for giving up the all by d: The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
Thoughts [sn35.25:1.9]: The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
